title: 7 Days in Life
resume: 7 Days in Life is a Hong Kong television comedy drama produced by Television Broadcasts Limited. The drama's broadcast was on TVB's television channels Jade and HD Jade from 24 January to 18 February 2011, consisting of 20 episodes. The two final episodes were aired back to back on 18 February 2011. 7 Days in Life is produced by Leung Choi-yuen and stars Steven Ma, Sonija Kwok, Bosco Wong, Patrick Tang, Yuen Wah, Mimi Lo, Joyce Cheng, and Koni Lui. The drama is a fictional telling of a group of different people residing in a hotel during a true event that occurred in May 2009, when the first reported case of a person carrying the H1N1 virus in Hong Kong stayed in a hotel in Wanchai, resulting in the hotel to be sealed off for 7 days.
